sentences.sentence: To study teratogenic effects of YF 1 germicide in mice.
sentences.translation: 探讨YF 1杀菌剂对小鼠的致畸作用。

sentences.sentence: Then, the whole spectacle gets even worse when you have to knead germicide into the contents.
sentences.translation: 然后更糟糕的事是你必须自己动手把杀菌剂均匀的揉进那些东西中。

sentences.sentence: Method Suspension quantitative germicide test was applied to observe the disinfection efficacy.
sentences.translation: 方法采用悬液定量杀灭试验，观察其消毒效果。
